heading: TIP: If you are unsteady on your feet, try doing this exercise near a wall so you can steady yourself if you need to. Having good balance is important for many everyday activities, such as going up and down stairs.

steps.1: Position the heel of one foot just in front of the toes of the other foot. Your heel and toes should touch or almost touch.
steps.2: Choose a spot ahead of you and focus on it to keep you steady as you walk.
steps.3: Take a step. Put your heel just in front of the toe of your other foot.
